BitTorrent

Class Bencoder2

  • java.lang.Object
    • BitTorrent.Bencoder2

  • public final class Bencoder2
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses a Bencoded byte array and returns a combination of Map, List, ByteBuffer, and Integer objects.
    Author:
    Robert Moore II

    • Method Detail

      • getInfoBytes

        public static final java.nio.ByteBuffer getInfoBytes(byte[] torrent_file_bytes)
                                              throws BencodingException
        Extracts the bencoded 'info' dictionary from a metainfo torrent file.
        Parameters:
        torrent_file_bytes - the bencoded metainfo dictionary.
        Returns:
        a ByteBuffer containing the bencoded 'info' dictionary from the metainfo file.
        Throws:
        BencodingException - if the 'info' key is not contained in the decoded dictionary.

      • decode

        public static final java.lang.Object decode(byte[] bencoded_bytes)
                                     throws BencodingException
        Decodes a bencoded object represented by the byte array.
        Parameters:
        bencoded_bytes - the bencoded data to decode.
        Returns:
        either a Map, List, ByteBuffer, or Integer.
        Throws:
        BencodingException - if the bencoded data was improperly formatted.

      • encode

        public static final byte[] encode(java.lang.Object o)
                           throws BencodingException
        Bencodes the specified object as a byte[].
        Parameters:
        o - the object to bencode.
        Returns:
        the bencoded form of the object.
        Throws:
        BencodingException - if o is not of type HashMap, ArrayList, Integer, or ByteBuffer.
